page.title: 12Factories and Firms.
page.content: {Most factories are in Rye Harbour {Road.}They produce mostly concrete,metal and building materials.Rycon sell chemicals,talc and plaster of Paris.{They sell the {talc to big chocolate firms like Mars {who use it to dust the chocolate.}They do this to stop the chocolate from getting sticky.Most of the products that go abroad from Rye Harbour go to places like France, Germany, Italy, Sweden, Finland and the Middle East.Europrene,a rubber substance,is imported. {In 1985 Long Products were {awarded the Europe Flag by the East {Sussex Council for their strong links {with Europe.}They also supplied the anti-skid finish for the new R.N.L.I.lifeboat house in Rye Harbour. {In 1982 J.Alsford Timber importers and {merchants,celebrated their centenary.
